@ABC @gregory_simon1 Too bad Cuomo is slashing Medicare benefits. Too bad he’s been closing unprofitable hospitals in mostly poor neighborhoods. Too bad Andrew Cuomo likes to talk the talk, but can’t walk the walk. Too bad #AndrewCuomoIsARepublican
